channel.title: Windows 7 problems with Servers
channel.description:
This is crazy, I've used Moparscape for years, but since I've been on Windows 7, I've got all these problems. First of all, I can't start Hybridscape. It returns the error : [code=text][10:12:29] Couldn't open output stream to log file -20120822.log [10:12:29] [10:12:29] Logging into (, *****) [10:12:29] Your UID is: 44024859 Server: ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:60550 Registering user player3 with pass Server: hybridscape Server (2): Exception! Server: ClientHandler: Client player3 disconnected. [/code]
I also cannot run the runserver.bat on project16 v3. I've tried 5-6 of them but none really work. Here's one of them. [code=text]@echo off color 0a title Server java "C:Program Files(x86)Javajdk1.7.0_03binjavac.exe" -cp . *.java pause[/code]
I usually get errors like "could not open jvm.cfg or could not find or load main class.
I also cannot use the webclient of Moparscape. Localhost or anyone's server, v3.2 or 4.
I'm not so sure but this never happened to me before, is it because of Windows 7? Or the new version of JDK? Or am I just an idiot. Any help will be appreciated.

item.title: Windows 7 problems with Servers
item.dc:creator: @olivierscape olivierscape
item.description:
@olivierscape wrote:

Wait… Is that thing to run the server or the compiler ?

Read full topic

item.title: Windows 7 problems with Servers
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

java “C:/Program Files(x86)/Java/jdk1.7.0_03bin/javac.exe” -cp . *.java

You need to have slashes, I am not sure why the JVM is set to run the compiler executable…

Read full topic

item.title: Windows 7 problems with Servers
item.dc:creator: @olivierscape olivierscape
item.description:
@olivierscape wrote:

Error: Could not find or load main class javac.exe.
I also have seen around 20 topics like mine, with people who can’t use HybridScape (They are disconnected) and I haven’t found any solution.

Read full topic

item.title: Windows 7 problems with Servers
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Post the errors then, kind of hard to help when we don’t even know what error has been throw…

Read full topic

item.title: Windows 7 problems with Servers
item.dc:creator: @olivierscape olivierscape
item.description:
@olivierscape wrote:

I did all of those, hour after hour. It just keeps giving me a different error each time.
I can’t even play the webclient of MoparScape…

C:\ProgramFiles(x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_34\bin;
CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files(x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_34\bin;%CLASSPATH%

I’ve got both JDK 1.7 and 1.6 I’m positive that I set them correctly…

Read full topic

item.title: Windows 7 problems with Servers
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Then check to make sure you have Java installed correctly and have set your environmental variables.

Read full topic

item.title: Windows 7 problems with Servers
item.dc:creator: @olivierscape olivierscape
item.description:
@olivierscape wrote:

That doesn’t change anything though. My computer won’t let me play HybridScape.

Read full topic

item.title: Windows 7 problems with Servers
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

You wrote the path incorrectly, C:/ect/ect/ect/ect.

Read full topic

item.title: Windows 7 problems with Servers
item.dc:creator: @olivierscape olivierscape
item.description:
@olivierscape wrote:

That doesn’t explain why I can’t run hybridscape or play moparscape servers.

item.title: Windows 7 problems with Servers
item.dc:creator: @sop-scape sop-scape
item.description:
@sop-scape wrote:

run.bat is wrong look around to see if you can find the right one for it… not to hard for it

Read full topic

item.title: Windows 7 problems with Servers
item.dc:creator: @olivierscape olivierscape
item.description:
@olivierscape wrote:

This is crazy, I’ve used Moparscape for years, but since I’ve been on Windows 7, I’ve got all these problems.
First of all, I can’t start Hybridscape. It returns the error :

[10:12:29] Couldn't open output stream to log file -20120822.log [10:12:29] [10:12:29] Logging into (, *****) [10:12:29] Your UID is: 44024859 Server: ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:60550 Registering user player3 with pass Server: hybridscape Server (2): Exception! Server: ClientHandler: Client player3 disconnected.

I also cannot run the runserver.bat on project16 v3. I’ve tried 5-6 of them but none really work.
Here’s one of them.

@echo off color 0a title Server java "C:Program Files(x86)Javajdk1.7.0_03binjavac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

I usually get errors like "could not open jvm.cfg or could not find or load main class.

I also cannot use the webclient of Moparscape. Localhost or anyone’s server, v3.2 or 4.

I’m not so sure but this never happened to me before, is it because of Windows 7? Or the new version of JDK? Or am I just an idiot.
Any help will be appreciated.

Read full topic
